content.heading: Daily content notes
content.sample: This block is a short sample paragraph to demonstrate the bilingual page structure. Switch to Turkish and the translation will appear instantly.

long.imageCaption: Ideas captured during a quiet, early-morning writing session.
long.imageAlt: Minimal desk setup with a notebook and cup of coffee
long.p1: My productive rhythm balances short sprints with deep-thinking sessions. I research with a sharp morning mind and polish the prose toward evening.
long.p2: While refining design systems, I like weaving color theory together with a nostalgic terminal vibe, giving readers something both familiar and fresh.
long.p3: The cadence of writing shapes the flow of code. Just as paragraphs need breathing room, components deserve carefully crafted spacing.
long.p4: Creating bilingual content means going beyond literal translation and searching for conceptual counterparts so that meaning travels with context.
long.p5: Accessibility tools and minimal interface prototypes sit on my radar this week. Every discovery feels like opening a new page in a holographic notebook.
long.p6: Documenting experiences matters as much as sharing them. This long-form note becomes a memory marker that guides future projects.

footer.tagline: Every line starts with curiosity and ends with discipline.
